text: Share So you watched Star Wars : Episode VIII — The Last Jedi, which hit movie theaters in December 2017, and you ’ re itching for hints about what ’ s to come? There are plenty of interesting details emerging about the upcoming Star Wars : Episode IX, including a few persistent rumors that have fans buzzing. The latest trilogy of Star Wars films will conclude with Episode IX, which brings back director J. J. Abrams to close out the latest arc of the iconic sci - fi saga after he helmed 2015 ’ s franchise - relaunching Star Wars : Episode VII — The Force Awakens. He directs from a script he co - wrote with Academy Award winner Chris Terrio ( Argo, Justice League ). The sequel trilogy ’ s final chapter is scheduled to hit theaters December 20, 2019
